description: Describes additional Sender transport parameters defined in the Transport Parameters register of the NMOS Parameter Registers. The constraints in this schema are minimum constraints, but may be further constrained at the constraints endpoint.
title: Externally-defined Sender Transport Parameters
Sender Output

ext_is_07_source_id.description: Identifies the Source that emits an IS-07 event. The sender should provide the ID of its associated Source. A null value indicates that the source has not been configured.

ext_is_07_rest_api_url.description: URL of the Events API resource providing the current state and type of an Event emitter (Source). A null value indicates that the source has not been configured.

ext_privacy_protocol.description: Defines the privacy encryption protocol adaptation.

ext_privacy_mode.description: Defines the encryption, authentication and key derivation functions.

ext_privacy_ecdh_sender_public_key.description: Defines the ECDH public key of the Sender.

ext_privacy_ecdh_receiver_public_key.description: Defines the ECDH public key of the Receiver.
